verses.text: \w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fourteenth|strong="H6240"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*’s reign, \w Sennacherib|strong="H5576"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria \w attacked|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w captured|strong="H8610"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fortified|strong="H1219"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w Rabshakeh|strong="H7262"\w*,\f + \fr 36:2 \ft Hebrew Rabshakeh is the title of a high-ranking Assyrian military officer; here and throughout chapters 36 and 37, as well as 2 Kings 18 and 19\f* \w with|strong="H3389"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H3515"\w* \w army|strong="H2426"\w*, \w from|strong="H7971"\w* \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. \w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H3389"\w* \w stopped|strong="H5975"\w* \w by|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* aqueduct \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w upper|strong="H5945"\w* \w pool|strong="H1295"\w*, \w on|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* road \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* Launderer’s \w Field|strong="H7704"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* Eliakim \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* administrator, \w Shebna|strong="H7644"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joah|strong="H3098"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Asaph \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w recorder|strong="H2142"\w*, \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3541"\w* \w Rabshakeh|strong="H7262"\w* said \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w them|strong="H2088"\w*, “\w Tell|strong="H4994"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria, \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* basis \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* confidence \w of|strong="H4428"\w* yours?

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* claim \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \f + \fr 36:5 \ft Literally You speak; see DSS and 2 Kings 18:20; MT I speak.\f* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w strategy|strong="H6098"\w* \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w strength|strong="H1369"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* these \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w empty|strong="H8193"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*. \w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* trusting, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w rebelled|strong="H4775"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*?

\w Look|strong="H2009"\w* \w now|strong="H2009"\w*, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H4428"\w* trusting \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w splintered|strong="H7533"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w staff|strong="H4938"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w pierce|strong="H5344"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w leans|strong="H5564"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Such|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* trust \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* say \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, ‘\w We|strong="H3588"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*,’ \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w One|strong="H2088"\w* whose \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w removed|strong="H5493"\w*, saying \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, ‘\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*’?

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H5921"\w*, \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bargain|strong="H6148"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w master|strong="H5414"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria. \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* two thousand \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*—if \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w can|strong="H3201"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w riders|strong="H7392"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*!

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* how \w can|strong="H5650"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w repel|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* single officer \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w least|strong="H6996"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* master’s \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w when|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* depend \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*?

\w So|strong="H5927"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* apart \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* land \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*? \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w Himself|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, ‘\w Go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* land \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.’”

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* Eliakim, \w Shebna|strong="H7644"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w Joah|strong="H3098"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Rabshakeh|strong="H7262"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Aramaic, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w understand|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Do|strong="H4994"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Hebrew \f + \fr 36:11 \ft Or in the dialect of Judah; also in verse 13\f* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Rabshakeh|strong="H7262"\w* \w replied|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w Has|strong="H1697"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w master|strong="H3427"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* only \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w master|strong="H3427"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* men \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* destined \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* eat \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w own|strong="H5973"\w* \w dung|strong="H2716"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w own|strong="H5973"\w* \w urine|strong="H7890"\w*?”

\w Then|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Rabshakeh|strong="H7262"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H1419"\w* \w loudly|strong="H6963"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* Hebrew: “\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria!

\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w Do|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w deceive|strong="H5377"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* persuade \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* says, ‘\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H5414"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*; \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria.’

\w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w Make|strong="H6213"\w* \w peace|strong="H1293"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w* \f + \fr 36:16 \ft Or Make a blessing with me\f* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*. \w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w every|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* eat \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* own \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* own \w fig|strong="H8384"\w* \w tree|strong="H8384"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* own cistern,

\w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* come \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* land \w like|strong="H5704"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* own—\w a|strong="H3068"\w* land \w of|strong="H3899"\w* \w grain|strong="H1715"\w* \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w new|strong="H8492"\w* \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* land \w of|strong="H3899"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*.

\w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H6435"\w* let \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w mislead|strong="H5496"\w* \w you|strong="H6435"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* says, ‘\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w us|strong="H6435"\w*.’ \w Has|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w god|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* any \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* ever \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* land \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria?

\w Where|strong="H3027"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* gods \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* Arpad? \w Where|strong="H3027"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* gods \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Sepharvaim|strong="H5617"\w*? \w Have|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*?

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w among|strong="H4310"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* gods \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* lands \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* land \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*? \w How|strong="H3588"\w* \w then|strong="H3588"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*?”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w remained|strong="H2790"\w* \w silent|strong="H2790"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* Hezekiah \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w commanded|strong="H4687"\w*, “\w Do|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w*’s \w son|strong="H1121"\w* Eliakim \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* administrator, \w Shebna|strong="H7644"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Asaph’s \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joah|strong="H3098"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w recorder|strong="H2142"\w* \w came|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* clothes \w torn|strong="H7167"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w relayed|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Rabshakeh|strong="H7262"\w*.
